entry.title: $2250 // Elevator Laundry Exposed Brick High Ceilings Crown Heights Franklin
entry.content:
Crown Heights Franklin Av, Botanic Garden


All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Franklin Av, Botanic Garden. Beautiful apartment in a pre-war elevator building. The unit features stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting, hardwood floors, exposed brick, large windows, large living room, and much more. Steps away from the S/2/3/4/5 train line, trendy Franklin Avenue shops, restaurants, coffee shops and bars. Just a few blocks from Prospect Park, Brooklyn Museum, Botanical Garden, Grand Army Plaza library, Prospect Park YMCA and much more. Must See! Crown Heights
